A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall\, I thought this movie was...okay. It’s not Phenomenal\, but it’s not awful either. Are there some stupid subplots? Yes. Is it visually appealing? Absolutely. The self proclaimed “die hard” Star Wars fans will probably not like it\, which explains why it has a low audience score. But is it better than Force Awakens? In my honest opinion\, yes
